languages.text: {n}Женщина пожимает плечами{/n} "Да будет Он милостив к вам, и да осветит путь во тьме своим алым сиянием..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина пожимает плечами{/n} "Да будет Он милостив к вам, и да осветит путь во тьме своим алым сиянием..."
traits.speaker: CannibalGirlScout

languages.text: {n}She shrugs.{/n} "May He be merciful to you, and light the path in the darkness with his crimson light..."

traits.locale_text: "May he be merciful to his servant and guide her through the endless night..."
traits.speaker: CannibalGirlScout

languages.text: {n}她耸了耸肩。{/n}“愿祂仁慈待你，用祂深红色的光芒照亮黑暗中的道路……”
languages.original_text: {n}She shrugs.{/n} "May He be merciful to you, and light the path in the darkness with his crimson light..."

traits.locale_text: {n}她耸了耸肩。{/n}“愿祂仁慈待你，用祂深红色的光芒照亮黑暗中的道路……”
traits.speaker: CannibalGirlScout

languages.text: {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Que el Emperador sea piadoso con usted e ilumine su camino en las sombras con Su luz carmesí...».
languages.original_text: {n}She shrugs.{/n} "May He be merciful to you, and light the path in the darkness with his crimson light..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Que el Emperador sea piadoso con usted e ilumine su camino en las sombras con Su luz carmesí...».
traits.speaker: CannibalGirlScout

languages.text: {n}女性は肩をすくめる。{/n}「彼の御慈悲がありますように、暗闇の道を深紅の光で照らしたまえ…」
languages.original_text: {n}She shrugs.{/n} "May He be merciful to you, and light the path in the darkness with his crimson light..."

traits.locale_text: {n}女性は肩をすくめる。{/n}「彼の御慈悲がありますように、暗闇の道を深紅の光で照らしたまえ…」
traits.speaker: CannibalGirlScout

languages.text: {n}Elle hausse les épaules.{/n} « Puisse l'Empereur se montrer clément envers vous et éclairer de Sa lumière écarlate le chemin qui s'enfonce dans les ténèbres... »
languages.original_text: {n}She shrugs.{/n} "May He be merciful to you, and light the path in the darkness with his crimson light..."

traits.speaker: CannibalGirlScout

languages.text: {n}Sie zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Möge Er gnädig mit Euch sein und den Pfad in der Dunkelheit mit seinem Purpurlicht erleuchten ..."
